ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: And there may be a difference in how effective our song is when he is meeding vs when he is not. Ie: if caster is not medding it adds 7 per tick (for example)
ygData.messageBody:
And there may be a difference in how effective our song is when he is
meeding vs when he is not. Ie: if caster is not medding it adds 7 per tick
(for example) but if he is medding it adds 12 per tick on top of what ever
the medding person regens mana at. Kinda like a song enhanced by
instrument - song effect is enhanced by the person medding - over and above
his natural med rate.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 1:17 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro


> No, I'm suggesting that Clarity is twice as effective if the
> caster is medding. I haven't done any tests non-medding so
> can't really say.
